text: Digaula gaa dugu di nadau laangi gi Paul, gei dogologowaahee ne lloomoi i di laangi deelaa gi di gowaa dela e noho iei Paul. Mai luada gaa dae loo gi di boo, mee nogo agoago gi digaula i di hai o Teenua King o God. E hagamada belee haga modongoohia gi digaula di hai o Jesus mai lodo Nnaganoho Moses mo lodo nia Beebaa o nia Soukohp.
